issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
How to represent:
1. Run in browser KitchenSink_HTML5 > UI Methods
2. Create TextField object
3. Set backgroundColor property by clicking 'bgColorProp'
4. Set backgroundGradient property by clicking 'bgGradientProp'
5. Click 'bgGradientProp' one more time to clear backgroundGradient property.
backgroundColor of the textField becomes the same color as window instead of green color which was set by 'bgColorProp'
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Object loses its backgroundColor when backgroundGradient set to undefined.
